key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.gui.commonswing.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.gui.base.EncodingsAvailable
key.description:
The property that defines which encodings are available in the export dialogs. This property defaults to "all" and can be set to either "all", "none" or "file".
If the property is set to "file", then the list of available properties is read from the file defined in the property "org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.encodings.file".

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.gui.base.EncodingsFile
key.description:
Defines the name of the properties file used to define the available encodings.
The property points to a resources in the classpath, not to a real file!

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.gui.base.StoreExportDialogInputs
key.description:
Defines, whether the export dialogs will store the users input (except any passwords) into the local configuration base. Set this to false, if you are concerned about any privacy leaks.
This setting is a master switch, which can be used to disable all user-input storages. For each export plugin, the storage method can be configured individually in the module specific configuration.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.gui.base.SwingDialogTranslation
key.description: Defines, whether we should translate the standard swing dialogs.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.gui.base.UseReportLocale
key.description: Defines, whether the GUI should use the report's locale to display itself. (This property is not used yet.)
